trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.ActivatingKeyTip> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref:System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.ActivatingKeyTip>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.ActivatingKeyTip>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified event handler on the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 叫用指定的物件上指定的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventHandler> instance and invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式來<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventHandler>執行個體，並叫用它。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The event handler to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The target on which the handler is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式會叫用的目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal offset from the specified horizontal placement.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定水平位移，從指定的水平位置。

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset the KeyTip horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 要水平位移 KeyTip 的數量。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that either evaluates to negative or positive infinity, or is not a number.
trans-unit.target: 屬性設定為值，計算結果為負或正的無限大，或者不是數字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal placement for the KeyTip relative to the placement target element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相對於放置目標項目的 KeyTip 的水平位置。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal placement for the KeyTip relative to the placement target element.
trans-unit.target: 放置目標項目相對 KeyTip 水平位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical offset from the specified vertical placement.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從指定的垂直位置的垂直位移。

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset the KeyTip vertically.
trans-unit.target: 要垂直位移 KeyTip 的數量。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that either evaluates to negative or positive infinity, or is not a number.
trans-unit.target: 屬性設定為值，計算結果為負或正的無限大，或者不是數字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical placement for the KeyTip relative to the placement target element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相對於放置目標項目的 KeyTip 的垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: The vertical placement for the KeyTip relative to the placement target element.
trans-unit.target: 放置目標項目相對 KeyTip 垂直放置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the KeyTip is displayed and accessible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 KeyTip 是否顯示，而且可存取。

trans-unit.source: When the KeyTipVisibility property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Visibility>, the KeyTip is visible and accessible.
trans-unit.target: 當 KeyTipVisibility 屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Visibility>，KeyTip 是可見和可存取。</xref:System.Windows.Visibility>

trans-unit.source: When the KeyTipVisibility property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Visibility>, the KeyTip is hidden but still accessible.
trans-unit.target: 當 KeyTipVisibility 屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Visibility>，KeyTip 是隱藏的但仍然可以存取。</xref:System.Windows.Visibility>

trans-unit.source: When the KeyTipVisibility property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Visibility>, the KeyTip is not visible and not accessible.
trans-unit.target: 當 KeyTipVisibility 屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Visibility>，KeyTip 不可見，且無法存取。</xref:System.Windows.Visibility>

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates whether the KeyTip is displayed and accessible.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出 KeyTip 是否顯示，而且可存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user interface element that serves as the target for placing the KeyTip.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定做為放置 KeyTip 的目標使用者介面項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that serves as the target for placing the KeyTip.
trans-unit.target: 做為放置 KeyTip 的目標項目。
